snippet: With the nominee increasingly isolated in his own party, the gun rights group has become one of his remaining supporters within the G.O.P. coalition....
abstract: National Rifle Assn has proved to be one of staunchest supporters of Donald Trump's presidential candidacy, even as Trump has scared off or driven away large numbers of Republican officials, donors and policy experts; NRA has invested millions of dollars in political ads. even as Republican groups have chosen not to and Trump campaign itself has failed to do so.

byline.original: By NICK CORASANITI and ALEXANDER BURNS
byline.contributor: Maggie Haberman and Kitty Bennett contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: With the nominee increasingly isolated in his own party, the gun rights group has become one of his remaining supporters within the G.O.P. coalition.

headline.main: One Ally Remains Firmly Behind Donald Trump: The N.R.A.
headline.print_headline: Amid Defections, One Ally Stands by Trump: N.R.A.
